title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not take effect as expected.
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The display property of an item set to 'none' should hide the item in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the PDF.
2. Open the 'Properties' view of the label.
3. Set the 'display' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new emitter.
5. Verify that the label is not visible in the PDF.
